duties_responsibilities.duty: Ensure compliance with the Gage Calibration Program and eliminate obsolete gaging.
Manage the Gage Calibration program, including ordering, re-certifications, and recording completion through GAGEtrak.
Coordinate with 3rd party calibration suppliers for scheduling, shipping, data records, and invoicing.
Perform gage method Repeatability and Reproducibility (Gage R&R) studies.
Participate in External audits, such as ISO 9001.
Communicate effectively, both orally and in writing, using Word, Excel, and Outlook.
Participate in Xylem Watermark volunteer activities.

education_certification.credential: 3 years’ minimum experience in quality gaging or engineering in a manufacturing environment.
Independent work, following directions with little or no supervision to execute program compliance.
Ability to see fine printed text and details of gage characteristics.
Ability to lift safely up to 35 pounds.
Ability to use lift support devices.
